title: I want to buy a drum back T206
author: iowadoc77

posts.post_title: I want to buy a drum back T206
posts.post_content:
Want to buy a T206 Drum back. 

PSA or SGC numerical grade please but would consider authentic designation
Please pm me with a scan or photo and a price. 
Thanks!
Eric

Any out there?
Willing to pay fairly. 
Thanks for looking.

Need a drum. I know they are out there. 
Thanks for looking.
Anyone want to sell a drum back?
It'll be a subzero day in hell before you find one. I wish you the best though!

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1609225]It'll be a subzero day in hell before you find one. I wish you the best though![/QUOTE]

I am going to delete that. Good luck with your hunt.

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1609225]It'll be a subzero day in hell before you find one. I wish you the best though![/QUOTE]


Yeah. Thanks. Super helpful. All the best to you as well. Keep hating jazz. I am sure that's a good hobby for you. 
There are enough of them out there. Just hoping someone wants to sell one.

you are right, they are out there.:).......I will put some feelers out for you.....I have one, but its part of my back run....problem is, the collectors who have them rarely want to part with them, then you have to pick them up at auction....I am going to make a few phone calls for you...

keep up the search! always! the rare backs are very fun....try on a scrap:)
I am pretty sure I saw one in an auction last year.  A Davidson Drum is my target. There have been enough graded by PSA, they will turn up if you don't have a specific player or grade target.

[quote name="mrvster" post=1609283]you are right, they are out there.:).......I will put some feelers out for you.....I have one, but its part of my back run....problem is, the collectors who have them rarely want to part with them, then you have to pick them up at auction....I am going to make a few phone calls for you...

keep up the search! always! the rare backs are very fun....try on a scrap:)[/QUOTE]

Thanks Johnny!  Much appreciated
Eric

[quote name="bbcard1" post=1609291]I am pretty sure I saw one in an auction last year.  A Davidson Drum is my target. There have been enough graded by PSA, they will turn up if you don't have a specific player or grade target.[/QUOTE]

Thanks Todd.  I think it will help that I do not have a specific player in mind for this.

Crawford drum just sold at Goodwin for $2700.

Good luck with the hunt!

[quote name="Thromdog" post=1609311]Crawford drum just sold at Goodwin for $2700.

Good luck with the hunt![/QUOTE

Thanks Jeff. Didn't love part of the back being trimmed. I was a bidder but let it go at the end.

[quote name="iowadoc77" post=1609256]Yeah. Thanks. Super helpful. All the best to you as well. Keep hating jazz. I am sure that's a good hobby for you. 
There are enough of them out there. Just hoping someone wants to sell one.[/QUOTE]

Hahaha! There actually is a t205 Drum on eBay right now.

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1609384]Hahaha! There actually is a t205 Drum on eBay right now.[/QUOTE]

Yep. You are correct. It has been there for a long time and has been altered but thanks for looking out.
What is your price expectation for a nice looking drum in a PSA 1 or SGC 10?

[quote name="PhillipAbbott79" post=1609414]What is your price expectation for a nice looking drum in a PSA 1 or SGC 10?[/QUOTE]

Email sent. Thanks.

I would love to get myself an early Christmas present!
Anyone need extra cash this Christmas season?
Thanks for looking.

Let's try this once more. 
Anyone?  Would like to see what's out there. 
Thanks for looking.
